title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From automation to autonomy: How AWS Partners drive SMB AI evolution at scale
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从自动化到自主化：AWS 合作伙伴如何大规模推动中小企业 AI 演进
abstract: In today's AI landscape, Small and Medium Business (SMB) face a pivotal moment: with 86% increasing their AI investments in 2026 and 77% expecting AI to deliver end-to-end process automation, expert partnership is the key to success. This lightning talk reveals how AWS Partners guide SMB customers from initial automation to true operational autonomy. Learn how partners address critical challenges in data readiness, talent gaps, security, and integration while maximizing return on investments. Through real-world case studies and practical strategies, discover how partners can help position your business at the forefront of AI innovation, from packaged solutions to cutting-edge implementations.
abstract_cn: 在当今的人工智能领域，中小型企业（SMB）正面临关键时刻：86%的企业将在2026年增加AI投资，77%的企业期望AI实现端到端流程自动化，专业合作伙伴是成功的关键。本次简短演讲揭示了AWS合作伙伴如何引导中小企业客户从初始自动化迈向真正的运营自主。了解合作伙伴如何应对数据就绪性、人才缺口、安全性和集成方面的关键挑战，同时最大化投资回报。通过真实案例研究和实用策略，探索合作伙伴如何帮助您的企业站在AI创新的前沿，从打包解决方案到前沿实施。

presenter.name: Niki Moshiri
presenter.title: Worldwide Partner Leader - Small & Medium Business
